snippet: Syria’s military continued bombarding the Babr Ama neighborhood of Homs and moved new tanks into the vicinity, raising fears of preparation for a ground assault, activists said.
abstract: Syrian military tightens its deadly vise on a besieged neighborhood of Homs, pounding the area from four sides with mortar and rocket fire, moving new tanks into the vicinity and raising fears of possible preparations for a ground assault.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad from Antakya, Turkey, an employee of The New York Times from Beirut, and Matt Flegenheimer and J. David Goodman from New York.

lead_paragraph: Syria’s military continued bombarding the Babr Ama neighborhood of Homs and moved new tanks into the vicinity, raising fears of preparation for a ground assault, activists said.

headline.seo: Syria Moves Ground Forces Around Besieged Area of Homs
headline.main: Syrian Forces Tighten Grip in Rebel City Under Siege
headline.print_headline: Syrian Forces Tighten Grip In Rebel City Under Siege
